column2: "Maka iyinom akyerɛ hom amma hom eemmfintsiw."
"Wobeyi hom edzi efi nhyiamudan mu mpo: dɔn no reba a obiara a oboku hom bɔdwen dɛ ɔdze rosom Nyankopɔn."
"Na wɔbɛyɛ iyinom osiandɛ wonnyim Egya no
column3: anaaso emi."
ama sɛ dɔn no ba a
column4: hom aakaa dɛ mekaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛm. Na ahyɛse no mannka iyinom annkyerɛ hom
column5: osiandɛ nna menye hom wɔ hɔ."

column3: morokɔ nyia ɔsomaa me no nkyɛn; naaso hom mu biara mmbisa me dɛ

column2: "Na osiandɛ maka iyinom akyerɛ hom ntsi
column3: awerɛhow ahyɛ hom akoma ma
column6: dɛ oye ma hom dɛ mokɔ

column3: obeyi wiadze atsɛn wɔ bɔn nye tsenenee nye atsɛmbu ho:"
osiandɛ wɔnngye me nndzi;"
osiandɛ morokɔ Egya no nkyɛn
osiandɛ woebu wiadze hen atsɛn."
na hom runntum nngye no sesei."
nokwar Sunsum no
column5: obegya hom kwan akɔ nokwar nyina mu: na ɔnnkɛhyɛ nankasa noho akasa
column6: na biribiara a ɔbɛtse na ɔbɛka
column7: na dza ɔreba so ɔbɛkyerɛ hom."

column3: osiandɛ ɔbɛfa dza ɔyɛ medze no bi na ɔdze abɛkyerɛ hom."

column2: "Dza Egya no wɔ nyina yɛ medze: iyi ntsi na mesee dɛ
column3: Ɔbɛfa dza ɔyɛ medze no bi na ɔdze abɛkyerɛ hom."
na bio aka kakra na hom bohu me

column2: "Na n’esuafo no binom kekae wɔ hɔn mu dɛ
column3: Ebɛn asɛm na ɔreka kyerɛ hɛn yi? Aka kakra na hom nnhu me; na bio aka kakra na hom bohu me: na
Ebɛn asɛm na ɔreka yi

column2: "Na Jesus hun dɛ wɔrepɛ ebisa no no
column3: ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Ana iyi ho na hom ribisabisa wɔ hom mu dɛ mesee dɛ
column5: Aka kakra na hom nnhu me
column6: na bio aka kakra na hom bohu me yi?"

column3: Hom bosu na hom edzi nkɔmbɔ
column4: na wiadze edzi dɛw; hom dze

column3: onya awerɛhow
column4: osiandɛ no dɔn edu; na sɛ onya wo ba no a
column6: wɔ ne dɛw a odzi dɛ wɔawo nyimpa aba wiadze ntsi."

column3: hom enya awerɛhow; na mubohu hom bio
column5: na hom dɛw no obi renngye no hom nsamu."

column2: "Na da no hom nnkebisa me hwee. Ampa
column3: meka kyerɛ hom dɛ
column4: Biribiara a hom bɛserɛ Egya no wɔ me dzin mu no

column2: "Ɔdze bodu sesei hom nnserɛɛ hwee wɔ me dzin mu: hom nserɛ na hom benya
column3: ma hom dɛw aahyɛ ma."

column2: "Maka iyinom akyerɛ hom wɔ mbɛbu mu. Dɔn no reba a mennkɛkasa akyerɛ hom wɔ mbɛbu mu bio
column3: na maka Egya no ho asɛm akyerɛ hom petee."

column2: "Da no hom bɛserɛ wɔ me dzin mu. Mennka nnkyerɛ hom dɛ mibebisa Egya no ama hom;"

column3: osiandɛ hom adɔ me na hom agye edzi dɛ mifi Nyankopɔn nkyɛn mebae."

column2: "Mifi Egya no nkyɛn na mebaa wiadze; bio meredan wiadze egya na makɔ Egya no nkyɛn."

column3: Hwɛ
na onnhia wo dɛ obi bisa wo: iyi mu na yɛgye dzi dɛ ifi Nyankopɔn nkyɛn bae."
Afei hom gye dzi?"
dɔn no reba na oenya edu a hom nyina bɛpetse akɔ homankasa homdze mu
column4: na hom adan mo nko egya
column6: osiandɛ Egya no wɔ me nkyɛn."

column2: "Maka iyinom akyerɛ hom ama hom eenya asomdwee wɔ mo mu. Wiadze mu dze
column3: hom wɔ ahohiahia mu naaso hom mma hom akoma ntɔ hom ntɔ hom yamu: osiandɛ medzi wiadze do konyim."
